coreAttributes.name: kerambit
coreAttributes.description: Originally made as a sickle-like agricultural tool, this small, easily-concealable knife soon began to see use as a weapon. The double-edged blade, made from enchanted ethereal energy, is sharply curved to resemble a tiger's claw, and is intended to be held pointing downward from the fist.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unsheathe)] the kerambit, readying it for use in combat.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(sheathe)] the kerambit, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Making a downwards slashing motion with [npc.her] kerambit, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to strike [npc2.name] in the chest; the ethereal arcane blade passing through [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Swiftly striking at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] kerambit, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to slash through [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the ethereal blade and drain [npc2.her] energy!

With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] kerambit, slashing the ethereal blade into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] kerambit, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to slash [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] kerambit, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] kerambit, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
